content: wrap yourself in comfort this fully reversible design knit in plush aran-weight yarn features classic k2 p2 ribbing with a soft bumpy texture quick to finish and soothing to work on it s perfect for confident beginners as well as seasoned knitters seeking a relaxing no-fuss project worked flat from the bottom up it comes together in no time delivering cozy warmth and the instant satisfaction of a handmade finish >it s a wrap is a fully tech-edited test-knit pattern offered as a thank-you to new subscribers current subscribers received this pattern in my december 2025 newsletter **finished measurements ** scarf wrap width 9 25 16 75 / 23 42 cm length 70 / 175 cm the sample pictured is the wrap size it s a wrap is fully customizable you can adjust the length width or yarn weight to suit your style and warmth needs add your own finishing touches such as tassels or fringe or experiment with color keep it solid for a classic look try stripes for a fun effect or opt for marled for added depth **skills needed ** knitters should be familiar with k1 p1 ribbing slipping stitches purlwise and binding off stitches in pattern **yarn ** in heavy worsted weight yarn approx 420 710 total yards required approximately 420 710 total yards required or berroco millstone tweed 97yds/89m 50g 60% wool 20% polyamide 20% viscose 5 8 balls sangria 11160
